links.description: The 10-day moving average for AAPL crossed bearishly below the 50-day moving average on April 22, 2022. This indicates that the trend has shifted lower and could be considered a sell signal. In 10 of 15 past instances when the 10-day crossed below the 50-day, the stock continued to move higher over the following month.

body: $TSLA Microsoft products need Elon for internet service, Tesla doesn’t need Microsoft at all.. $MSFT we more comparable with $AAPL

$SPY If everyone was honest they would realize that no its not because  Biden that the Market is down, for years the Fed has been & still does control where we go. 
 
We can start w/ the most recent history with GS & 2008, Fed has kept the illusion going since then & they've said enough for now. So Wall is having a hissing fit, Daddy stopped paying. 
 
When Trump said "If you elect Biden the Market will fall" he was saying "If I leave the con will be taken away,"  thats what he meant. 
 
The fact that people are upset because PE are being taking back to a reasonable multiples & CEO's cant BS about Future growth is telling 
 
This quote is from the 1800's, tell whats changed

Thank you all! It is my one year anniversary since I started my site and helping both investors and traders navigate through some of our most challenging mkts. 

And how fitting an anniversary as we get set for arguably the most important week this year - the "Generals" (AMZN,  TSLA,  MSFT,  AAPL. FB) are all on deck and them along with the PCE data will be crucial in determining our mkt direction for the foreseeable future. 

What I do takes enormous amount of time and effort. To provide  accurate content each and every day so as to have an educational platform for you all to learn from has been a passion of mine and I look forward to another year ahead. 

Thank you all! 

jessielivermore1929@gmail.com
